config.name: startDay
config.desc: Day index at which the week should begin, 0-based (defaults to 0, which is Sunday)

config.name: monthYearText
config.desc: The header month selector tooltip (defaults to 'Choose a month (Control+Up/Down to move years)')

config.name: monthNames
config.desc: An array of textual month names which can be overriden for localization support (defaults to Date.monthNames)

config.name: listeners
format
config.desc:
The default date format string which can be overriden for localization support.  The format must be
valid according to {@link Date#parseDate} (defaults to 'm/d/y').

config.name: nextText
config.desc: The next month navigation button tooltip (defaults to 'Next Month (Control+Right)')

config.name: maxText
config.desc: The error text to display if the maxDate validation fails (defaults to "This date is after the maximum date")

config.name: constrainToViewport
config.desc: True to constrain the date picker to the viewport (defaults to true)

config.name: minText
config.desc: The error text to display if the minDate validation fails (defaults to "This date is before the minimum date")

config.name: disabledDatesText
config.desc: The tooltip text to display when the date falls on a disabled date (defaults to "")

config.name: todayTip
config.desc: The tooltip to display for the button that selects the current date (defaults to "{current date} (Spacebar)")

config.name: hideMode
config.desc:
How this component should hidden. Supported values are
"visibility" (css visibility), "offsets" (negative offset position) and
"display" (css display) - defaults to "display".

config.name: todayText
config.desc: The text to display on the button that selects the current date (defaults to "Today")

config.name: cancelText
config.desc: The text to display on the cancel button

config.name: allowDomMove
config.desc: Whether the component can move the Dom node when rendering (defaults to true).

config.name: showClear
config.desc: Show a clear button (usefull for date form elements that can be blank.)

config.name: prevText
config.desc: The previous month navigation button tooltip (defaults to 'Previous Month (Control+Left)')

config.name: dayNames
config.desc: An array of textual day names which can be overriden for localization support (defaults to Date.dayNames)

config.name: actionMode
config.desc:
which property holds the element that used for  hide() / show() / disable() / enable()
default is 'el'

config.name: disabledDaysText
config.desc: The tooltip to display when the date falls on a disabled day (defaults to "")

config.name: disabledDatesRE
config.desc: JavaScript regular expression used to disable a pattern of dates (defaults to null)

config.name: minDate
config.desc: Minimum allowable date (JavaScript date object, defaults to null)

config.name: disabledDays
config.desc: An array of days to disable, 0-based. For example, [0, 6] disables Sunday and Saturday (defaults to null).

config.name: okText
config.desc: The text to display on the ok button

config.name: maxDate
config.desc: Maximum allowable date (JavaScript date object, defaults to null)

config.name: disableClass
config.desc: CSS class added to the component when it is disabled (defaults to "x-item-disabled").
